## MentionExtensionMatcher interface

The options for the matchers which can be created by this extension.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface MentionExtensionMatcher extends Pick<Suggester, 'char' | 'name' | 'startOfLine' | 'supportedCharacters' | 'validPrefixCharacters' | 'invalidPrefixCharacters' | 'matchOffset' | 'appendText' | 'suggestClassName'> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [mentionClassName](./extension-mention.mentionextensionmatcher.mentionclassname.md) | <code>string</code> | Provide customs class names for the completed mention |
